Wellen -- a framework for exploring and teaching generative music making and algorithmic compositions

See Wellen for further information.

Package wellen

Class ToneEngineOSC

java.lang.Object
wellen.ToneEngine
wellen.ToneEngineOSC
public class ToneEngineOSC extends ToneEngine
implementation of ToneEngine sending OSC messages to external network devices.
